lead_paragraph: Defender John Stones does not deserve to face intense scrutiny over his costly slip in England's 2-1 loss to Netherlands on Tuesday at Wembley, manager Roy Hodgson has said.

headline.print_headline: Hodgson Confidence Carved in Stones Despite England Slip
headline.main: Hodgson Confidence Carved in Stones Despite England Slip

snippet: Defender John Stones does not deserve to face intense scrutiny over his costly slip in England's 2-1 loss to Netherlands on Tuesday at Wembley, manager Roy Hodgson has said....
